1.content:
The farm, large as it was, was a bit secluded. you would have driven right past it if not for the sign out by the mail box. "Zimmerman farm." a phone number was given below the sign, and you had been told why when you spoke to the man himself on the phone a few days ago. Zimmerman bred horses, or so he claimed. he specializes in the larger breeds, focusing further on Clydesdales and shires. the cows, on the other hand, really didn't do much but provide further tax exemption, as did all of his other animals. He did not mention what other things he did to make money, but it was irrelevant.

he had contacted you because he had noticed strange lights flashing in his stable about three days ago. when he approached and made his presence known, the lights stopped. none of his prized horses seemed harmed in any way, but you were contacted to prevent them from becoming so.

His driveway was a half mile set of tire ruts with tall grass lining the middle. his house looked humble enough, but the stable seemed only a fraction smaller. you could make out five windows of stalls, two of which were occupied. a yellow horse and an even larger black one poked their heads out as you came closer. you had always been slightly wary of horses. they were too big for you to be comfortable around them. these would be downright unsettling to stand beside.

Zimmerman came out of the house as you parked and greeted you warmly, shaking your hand with a firm grip and asking if the place was hard to find. together you walked to the stable so you could look around.

You were right: these two horses, the yellow actually a light brown Clydesdale, and the other a huge shire horse, turned around in their stalls and stared at you as the two of you entered the stable. at the shoulders, they were each at least five and a half, maybe even six feet tall, intimidating your just below six foot self. Zimmerman assures you that they are gentle giants, and goes on to explain that nothing is stolen or damaged, but the lights are definitely concerning. after looking around you tell him that you will stay the night to see if these lights will come back, and find out what they are.
---------------
You awaken from a light sleep with the taste of a Big Mac still clinging to your breath. you look sleepily toward the stable and see a bright flash of light. It's time to do your job.
1.title: It Begins normally...

11.content:
You get out of your car and creep to the open door of the stable under the cover of darkness. As you get closer, your mind begins to race. What could it be? Aliens? witches? Wizards? There's no telling!

You peek from behind the wall and see two men. Just two, regular men, one of which is holding what looks like a strange gun. Kind of a let down, really. As you watch, the man aims the weapon at the black shire horse you saw earlier and fires. Before your eyes, the horse begins to shrink, smaller and smaller until you can't make it out from here. A few seconds later, he fires again, and he horse is back to its original size.

Forget your job! Curiosity commands you to get a better look. You dash forward and hide behind a metal shelf of grooming products. The strangers haven't noticed you. You lean out and take another look. Plonk! A bottle of horse shampoo tumbles from the shelf and bounces on the ground. Too late you reach out to grab it, exposing your position in the process. You look back and find both men staring at you. An awkward silence fills the barn.

You leap out and dive toward the stall on the opposite side of the stable, containing a brown and white paint horse. Just as you reach it, a white light blinds you and you fall unconscious.
11.title: Investigate.

111.content:
Wow, that dream was intense! You can't remember the last time one was quite that vivid.
You sit up and stretch away the soreness in your back, then you smell something. something that isn't your home. Your eyes snap open and you see a world that is definitely not your house. You see the stable, but it looks so much bigger! What happened!? Judging by your surroundings, you can only be...
111.title: When you wake up...

1111.content:
the ground below you is a thick layer of yellowish sticks about the width of your forearm and far longer than you are tall. you tentatively bounce on the ground to see if it can even hold you. its springy, but it will hold you. you're still freaking out and you look around. you see a brown horse, undoubtedly a Clydesdale, judging by its size and build, in the opposite stall. beside it in the hallway is the same shelf you hid behind last night. as the events of the previous evening become more clear, you remember one terrifying detail:

there is a horse in this stall.

slowly, you turn around, dreading the consequences of being right, and you are. a massive brown pillar rises up into the air only a hundred feet or so from you. you follow it upward, wincing the whole way. its connected to a brown and white speckled body, a thick neck, and an equine head, presently looking out of the stall. you whimper. this thing could reduce you to a bloody paste on the ground and not even notice, or care for that matter.
1111.title: 1 inch tall!

11111.content:
Okay... time to go. With adrenaline already coursing through your tiny body, you sprint toward the stall door, a massive wall of red painted wood. At this size it would take hours to climb, hours you do not think you have. Thankfully, there was a gap between it and the packed earth floor just high enough for you to squeeze through, though on your belly. Your shirt snags on bits of sand and rock, tearing in a few places, but you make it.

Outside only terrifies you more. At the opposite side of the stable, directly in front of you, is a black shire horse that easily dwarfs the one you just got away from. Worse yet, you as other horses heads in all but one of the stalls. You press your back to the stable door, feeling a panic attack coming on. But, you have to move on, find safety, get help, anything to improve your situation. You start walking toward the center of the stable when movement to your left makes you freeze in place.
11111.title: Get away from that behemoth!

choices: wait for zimmerman to return. He has to!
head out on your own. no point waiting.
11112.content:
This cannot be happening. This CANNOT be happening! People can't shrink! How are you going to survive like this? That one horse can end you in more ways than you want to consider, and this stable has five, not to mention the other few outside. How are you going to eat? How are you going to get around? How are-

"MORNIN' BOYS!" A mans voice booms, cutting off every thought in your head. You spin around, stepping in a hole amongst the straw and falling into your butt. You see Zimmerman, in his titanic form, striding casually into the stable. Minor tremors shake the spongy ground beneath you from his footsteps.

He's it. He's your ticket. If you can get to him somehow, everything will work out. You quickly stand back up, but he's already passed by your stall. What's more concerning is a loud rumbling above you. Looking up, the paint horse is staring at Zimmerman impatiently. You see it shift, and watch it's leg begin to move. Directly toward you. You get up and run, no point in waiting to get crushed. It's hard to do with all the straw, and you don't get more then five steps before you trip and fall. All you can do it turn and watch. The hoof is descending, casting a shadow over you. It slams down just in front of you, sending a powerful shockwave through the ground, and tossing you up a few feet. You lift up and roll toward the horses hoof, finally stopping against it.

You're shaking with pent up fear. You use the hoof as a prop to stand up and lean on as you breathe away the energy. Sadly, fate has other plans. Zimmerman is back, carrying a bridle. He stops in front of your stall.

"Zimmerman!" You scream desperately, "down here!" You can't jump in your position, but you're waving your arms like a madman. He doesn't even hear you, and proceeds to fasten the bridle over the horses head. You watch hopelessly as he completes and removes the barricade from the stall.

Suddenly, your flying, in a way. The hoof lifts, moving so fast that your pressed against it on your back by the sheer motion of it. In a matter of a second, you're carried right out of the stall and into the hallway, a packed earth floor with a few pieces of straw scattered around. And, like a catapult, the descent and step of the horse throws you forward far more violently than you had pictured. You bounce and roll along the ground, kicking up a mild dust trail and causing yourself a bit of pain. You stop, laying face down on the damp ground, feeling the decreasing earthquakes of two colossi exit the stable.
11112.title: you hear someone coming.

choices: A flock of chickens comes foraging
A chicken hawk is looking for an easy meal
111122.content:
Lifting yourself out of the mud, you shake off as much of the dirt as possible.

Working a farm's always a dirty job, but this is ridiculous. Well, perhaps it's time to stop complaining and think of a way out of this mess. If something shrunk you, something can, uh, unshrink you. You just need to figure it out unless you're prepared to spend the rest of your life one inch tall, which you're not.

Your first instinct is to wait for Zimmerman's return. He's the only one capable of helping. The horses are not going to offer any assistance in that area. In fact, one clumsy movement and they could end you with a misplaced hoof. Yea, best to stay away from those behemoths until you can return to normal size.

You rush toward the huge door leading out of the stable. The dirt, packed hard from being constantly trodden by ZImmerman's horses, actually affords you good speed as you dash into the open area outside the stable.

That this might not be the best idea become clearer when...
111122.title: head out on your own. no point waiting.

choices: It thinks your a yummy bug
It lays down on you. (Crunch or your just under The feathers)
1111221.content:
You raced out into the open area outside the stables. The sun is brighter at your size and the breeze a bit stronger but it feels good to be away from the gigantic Horses inside. Looking around you can see the pig sty a ways off, the cows in the pasture, and the chicken coupe next to the stables where you are.


Taking a few steps, you stopped and quickly looked at the chicken coupes area again and quickly panicked once you saw the gate was open. Zimmerman must have opened it on the way into the stables to allow the chickens to roam around. Thinking you would have a better chance if you where not out in the open, for the chickens to see you started towards the pig sty, following along the fence between the two areas. Your a quarter of the way there when a shadow blocks the sun, followed by a loud noise. Looking up you see a chicken had just jumped up onto the fence your walking along. The brown hen looks to be surveying the ground. You stand perfectly still. You know a chicken has better sight then a human. The slightest movement and your chicken feed. You try not to flinch as you now notice more chickens flooding the area. They are pecking at the ground, occasionally capturing an unlucky bug, while foraging for food.

On chicken nearly stepped on you as it clicked it way across the yard. You where caught off guard, when it stretched itself upwards and flapped its wings, blowing you off your feet. You hit against a tall object and roll to a stop. Opening your eyes you look up and see you had bounced off a chicken leg. The chicken turned its head and....
1111221.title: A flock of chickens comes foraging

choices: You get though the hole but the chickens head fits though and grabs you
You  get to safety from the chicken
Another chicken snatched you when you jumped

Lowering it head the chicken goes to snatch up the bug. The bug makes a weird noise as you move towards it, but a bug is a bug, and your not going to let it get away.

You see the chicken is staring at you like its hit the jackpot. You can see the hunger in its eyes as it stares at you. The chickens head lowers down quickly to grab you and you scream as you dodge it a few times. You see a hole in another pen and jump for it to get away.

The chicken stomach growl and decided you were bug and nothing else

You immediately through the hole and thought you were safe until suddenly you saw Chicken head fits through the hole as you tried run away!

The chicken see it bug was tried get away but chicken won’t let it yummy food get away, as chicken quickly use it beak and succeeded catch it! “Haha I catch my bug and now I shall eat it.” The chicken said to it self.

You were now completely panic and what to do when suddenly you were tossed into the air as you landed head first in chicken mouth! “PLEASE NOT EAT ME, I AM NOT A BUG!” You yelled.

Chicken stop when it heard the bug made these weird noise again and thought “I wonder if this is really is a bug I am going to eat?”

The chicken soon heard it stomach and decided you were bug nothing else! And with that it tilted head backwards as it felt the bug slip toward it throat and then swallow the bug with a *Gulped* sound. “That bug was very delicious but the little bug wouldn’t full my stomach, so I shall go and eat some grains.” The chicken said to it self, as it started to walk back to chicken coops.

(Meanwhile)
You were be pulled down by the chicken esophagus towards it stomach and after few mins, you heard *Splurt* nosies as you see pink slimy tunnel opens up below you, as it made you tumble into an acrid and disgusting of Chicken! “LET ME OUT! choices: Yes you somehow survived but now you’re somehow inside her chicken egg
11112211121.content: Do you actually got Digested or did you somehow survive?”

11112211231.content: You look behind you to see the chicken walk off, frustrated that it lost out on you. You give yourself a pat on the back for escaping the chicken but no sooner do you realize you have bigger problems ahead of you, much bigger problems. In the grassy pasture in front of you, there are many cattle, of all walks of life, male and female, meandering about the pen. You look and only see that there is one way to leave that one might consider safe, that being under the fence on the opposite side of the pasture. The left side has a forest bordering it and the right side is up against a large barn. Obviously you cannot go back or else you’ll have to face the chickens again. You really have two options here. You could try to make your way through the pasture or you could escape to the woods.
11112211231.title: Yes

111122113.content:
You thought you were safe, but suddenly you were facing another hungry chicken!

The chicken also thinks you’re a yummy bug and quickly snatches you before you can run away. You try to wiggle and scream, but nothing works, the strength of its beak is too much for your tiny body.

Just like any bug, you get eaten by the chicken which then swallows you. You land in a splash within its stomach. The chicken thinks you were a very yummy bug and goes pecking more grains.

Meanwhile...
111122113.title: Another chicken snatched you when you jumped

1112.content:
You wander around, dazed and awestruck. The pieces of hay that were littered around you came up to your chest sideways. Splotches of dried mud, miniscule to the normal person were now small brown boulders to your miniscule form. The noises and smells that surrounded you were intolerable. The traces of various farm animals, now gargantuan in scale. Their noises became a cacophony of thunderous roars, their smells were amplified a thousand fold. You felt queazy, disorientated.

*BOOM*

What was that? An earthquake?

*BOOM*

No. Earthquakes don't happen like this.

*BOOM*

You turn around and see a towering shadow in the light streaming in from the open door. It was...
1112.title: Half an inch tall!

11121.content:
A man stood in that door frame. A man of impossible scale. The light made him seem god-like.

*BOOM*

As he took another step forward, you could see him more clearly now. It was a tall, blond lad. He looked to be in his early 20s with scruffy dirty blonde hair and deep blue eyes. His torso was bare, most likely due to the warm day outside unveiling a ripped and sweaty physique. His legs were covered in denim jeans and green Dunlop wellies.

*BOOM*

Another step. Those towering boots were walking in your direction.

*BOOM*

You've gotta do something!

*BOOM*

The giant lifts his foot again. You have to do something NOW!
11121.title: A Farm Hand

111211.content:
That was the wrong way to run...

*BOOM*

The boot lands on top of you with a sickening crunch. You're ground into paste beneath, too insignificant for the young man to notice as he goes about his daily work.
111211.title: Wrong Way

choices: The giant's home, still in the shadow of his boots
The middle of a field, man or boot nowhere to be seen
111212.content:
*BOOM*

The boot lands on top of you but you're within one of the treads. You're alive... Bt before you can breathe a sigh of relief, the boot rises again and you're going a long for the ride!

*BOOM*

Every step the giant takes fills you with puke as the monstrous man's impossible speed fills you with inertia. It only takes a few steps before you start to feel as if you're losing conciousness. You're slipping away... away... away...

When you wake, you find yourself in...
111212.title: Stuck in the Mud

1112121.content:
You awoke to a cacophony of noise, thunderous THUMPs were still shaking the floor around you joined by roars for the skies above. You were in a spacious room now, the mud beneath you now wood. You turn around to see the vast treads of the boots that captured lying up and on their sides as they lay discarded beneath a monolithic table. And speaking of footwear, you now suddenly notice that your nose is being assaulted by the heavy wafts of stale footwear eminating from the massive balled up Hanes socks to the left of you. You walk away, trying to escape that horrible stench. However, it's not long before you realise the THUMPs getting louder and more violent. You look up to see... him, the farm hand turned titan and he was walking in your direction.

The ground started to push you off it once more as the giants stinky, reddened bare feet threatened to stomp you out of existence once more. You make a dash and jump out of harm's way as a foul smelling gale overtook your entire body. As he walked off, you notice that the young man was talking to someone on the phone. That rolling thunder from the sky? His southern accented voice turned deep and unintelligible due to it's sheer volume. As you watch him, you quickly notice that he's turning around and heading back in your general direction. It was also then that an idea came across your head. If you ran out juuuust far enough ahead, he might see you! But it'd be a risky maneuver. Perhaps it'd be better to wait it out and see if there was a safer time to try to grab this god's attention...
1112121.title: The Giant's Apartment

11121211.content:
Its better to be safe then sorry. Stepping in the path of an oncoming Titan at just the mere size of an ant surely is not one of the smartest idea's right now. You decide it would be best to wait and take cover behind the safety of one of his dirty work boots. The stench of feet sweat, mud, and animal droppings all cling to this young mans footwear. All you can do is try to ignore the various odors for now and plan your next move..

The giant stomps right over you and the boots. It appears he is no longer talking on his cellphone and is now approaching his front door. He obviously is not planning on leaving since he has no shoes on but rather going to open it to let somebody inside. The front door creaks open, allowing some sunlight to pour in which blinds you temporarily! Using your left arm, you attempt to shield your face from the intense UV rays as the silhouette of yet another towering figure fills the entry way. Lowering your arm and rubbing your eyes to better adjust to the change of lighting, that figure is...
11121211.title: Hide and Wait

111212112.content:
A smaller, but still enormous by all means, figure enters the mans apartment. Its a young woman. The man greets her with a hug and a kiss, she addresses the man by his name, "Mitch" first. Mitch, addresses the woman as "Sadie". Great, at least you know these two titan's names. Sadie is a bartender at a local Bar and just got off work. After exchanging more hugs and personal quotes, Sadie decides to get comfortable and starts by removing her shoes. Sadie kicks off her dirty black Nike work/running sneakers. One of the overturned shoes lands just several feet from you! The odor emitting from them is horrific. In fact, her feet stink worse than the boyfriends. No kidding. You immediately throw up all of your breakfast and lunch as you scurry away from that shoe. Sadie tells Mitch that she is going to change into her pajamas, but before she does that, she throws a packet of popcorn into the microwave and asks Mitch to get a movie ready on Hulu.

As the couple prepare too settle in for the night, you think really hard as to how you will get these massive humans attention. Of course, you are too small to be heard, but visible enough to be mistaken for a bug and get squished. You need to be careful and handle this situation gently. A minute passes and Sadie comes out of the bathroom in her pajama pants, right as the microwave beeps, indicating that the popcorn is ready. Sadie's massive barefoot slams down just feet from where you stand! Your stomach churns as the stench washes over you like a tsunami wave!

"Mmmm....that popcorn smells good, babe..." Kevin says just after the microwave beeps, indicating that their movie snack is ready.

"Yeah, I got the extra buttery kinda." Sadie said, getting up too retrieve the bag of popcorn from the microwave! Once again, the smell of feet is overwhelming as Sadie's giant foot passes over you! God this is disgusting. However, you really need to somehow get too higher ground. What are you gonna do, Bucko?
111212112.title: Enter Sadie

choices: half of the Popcorn bowl falls on you...
1112121121.content:
You watch as Sadie walks over to where Mitch is and gets confront-able by cuddling up against him. "mmmm.. can't wait to dig into this buttery popcorn, So babe what did you decide for us to watch?" Sadie says looking happily looking up at Mitch who responds with "I think Jack black's Gulliver's Travels sounds good, if you don't like it we can always just leave it on and enjoy each others company if you know what I mean". Mitch then goes in for a kiss which is reciprocated by Sadie kissing him back, then slapping his face teasingly saying "Or we can do something that is actually enjoyable and just watch the movie you picked out". Sadie then sticks her tongue out at Mitch and He just teasingly plays back with giving her a tickle.

You watch from a distance as the giants play with each other for a few minutes, and then they finally settle down as the movie starts to play. Your chance to take action is now, there is only one option that is going through your head right now, that you have to get to higher ground and retrieving the help from these giants might be the only way you have of one day returning to normal size again. With that thought, you trek your way towards the giants, in your head you think "I'm going to have to climb one of them to reach there ear, it's disgusting and very scary to think about but that might be the only way that I survive being tiny".

Popcorn and crumbs start to rain down from right above you, as you approach the closet giant who was Sadie. The intense familiar stink of her foot instantly draws its self over you. You do your best as you get closer to the smelly, dirty foot to keep from throwing up. Looking up her, while being between her toes, the foul odor is unbearable, you see toe jam in between her toes that you just hope that you never get stuck in. The climb starts now, you take a deep breath of the rotten air around you, knowing full well that you don't want to try and smell anything till you reach a better spot, and theirs no turning back. As you jump up and climb onto her in between toe.

The squishy, wet, and clearly sweaty skin that is below you makes it a bit hard to keep your balance as you make your way past the toe jam toward the center of the horrible environment that is Sadie's foot. You are like a an ant to her that she can just barley feel and enough for her mind to just ignore. Sadie then starts to move trying to get more confront-able, completely unaware of the fact that she is causing a great amount of distress towards a tiny man that is climbing her foot. You not wanting to do this but having no choice get down and try to hold onto the sweaty gigantic foot skin.

All Sadie manages to do though is stretch her leg out causing you to fall from her foot to the leg that is below you. The hit was like a falling rock, the fall hurt you slightly but luckily you were able to keep a grasp on the woman's leg. A little dazed at what just happened you get up to look straight ahead to see the giant short pajama pants in the distance and a good min from there her breast that cover the sight of her face. Her leg then cradles back in forth for a second that was followed with...
1112121121.title: Climb one of them....

choices: you have come this far, so push through it and get this approach over with
decide that your to exhausted to move (sleep in the pocket)
Sadie brushes you off with the crumbs that are all over her chest
11121211212.content:
The motion stopped and didn't follow with anything else but the sound of Sadie giant voice "This movie so bad babe haha, I never understood the making of Gulliver's Travels. I mean who would want to imagine life at being so small, that's so disgusting to even think about haha" She then gives Mitch a kiss and says "I love my big strong man".

After this was heard you think of the irony of the situation that your thrown in for someone who never wanted to know what it was like to be so small. You then start your trek once again, Taking breaths in, being glad that your starting to get a good distance from her feet smell with each inch you take towards Sadie's knee. There is though a sweaty odor that does come up as you approach the giantess knee, from right under it. But it's definitely not as bad as before. You climb to the top of the knee and catch your breath. To you it feels like you just walked half a mile, but in reality it was only a few feet (ha ha (: ).

It doesn't take you to long to start moving again, since standing still won't get you very far. You were forced to have to scrape your way down Sadie enormous thigh, since it was at a particular angle. Touching the bottom of the thigh a huge foul odor swept right into your face. It was coming from right in front of you, under the short pajama pants. The smell was toxic, you had no idea which was more gross this intense stench that was clearly coming from Sadie's crotch or the dirty foot from before. Either way that didn't matter to much to you. What matter was just getting past this obstacle, you then jump and grab a hold of the shorts and tread your way on top of it. You try your best to hold your breath once again, as the intense smell that is bouncing off her gigantic vagina seems to seep its way through her pants and make your venture that much harder to endure.

The hope that this all ends with the giants helping you get big again is all that keeping you from just giving up and running away. On your way to the waist band you even gag a little as you have to cross right over something sticky on her pants. Not wanting to even think about what it is though, you venture on and safely make it to the beginning of her shirt. Still holding your nose, you walk across the squishy domain that is her stomach, its not like she's fat, she is skinny but she has no strong ab's either.

As you walk across the squishy tummy, you are thankful for making this far and the two giants being engulfed in the movie made it that much easier to trek this far. You then make it to a sort of slope that leads up to her Boobs. So you cling to her pajama shirt and climb your way up. On your climb you start to notice an intense smell of perfume that smelled soft and gentle but also toxic at your size it was hard to tell if it was hard to breath because of it or not. You did your best though to ignore it, since ts defiantly better then crotch or feet.

The hardest part of your journey thus far for you was right now trying to make it over her right boob, which felt soft and enticing. But being this size you didn't really want much to do with it. You seem to have made it over her boob and immediately notice just how tired you are getting. You cling to the shirt and look up to see crumbs of popcorn, a giant Sadie's face with brown hair that touches her shoulders, with a giant man arm wrap around her neck cuddling her against him. As you look to your side, you see a giant top to a front shirt pocket. it looks sort of deep but if you were to climb in it you know you could climb out.

The thought then hit you, since your so exhausted right now and seeing that the movie is about 15 mins from being done. Maybe it's a good idea to just call it for now and get some rest in her front pocket. Sure you hate the idea of being tiny and being in a giant girls pocket may sound like a good time to most, to you thinking logically it sounds more dangerous then enticing. But with your time having a limited window to grab her attention and feeling like your going to fall over due to need of rest, you need to decide fast if its better to just keep moving or grab some rest...
11121211212.title: nothing, you continue your climb

choices: your hard work is paid off
Sadie gets up and you roll back in
she rolls over and you slide off the huge bed..
111212112122.content:
The movie was in its concluding song and leading up to its happy ending, at this point it would be to far for you to reach Sadie's ear before she got up and swung you off of her. Plus sleep didn't sound to bad for someone who just climb a mile and a half. So you make your way over to the pocket and drop yourself inside, safely and no real injuries acquired while doing so since it was a soft cloth. And as your prediction was right Sadie got up as soon as you made it to the top of the pocket, Sadie stenches, and you immediately fall asleep for what an hour and wake up to the pressure of two titans hugging each other with you in the middle. " Anyway that was okay for a Gulliver movie babe but next time I think I should be the one to pick the movie, sound good my fierce strong man". But the great viewing moment was short lived as your stomach started to lurch as gravity took over and started pulling you towards the ground.

You gaze down to see where you were going to land and to your horror it was that wretched horse again! You could plainly see now it was a Shire horse. Dark brown hair and trimly cut mane. As you descended down you first thought "How the hell am I going to survive this fall?" It seems fate had other plans as a gust of wind from the open stable window blew you aside in mid freefall drop. The wind blew you away from the horses' middle back and towards one the ends of the horses' body. You could see the horses' end approaching fast but to which end did the gust blew you towards? The front end where the horses' ears and head and snout was? Or was it the rear end, where it's rump and thick black hair tail was?
11131211.title: You are knocked off the hay pile and sail up in...

1113122.content: Try as you might, you are too petrified to make the move. The whole nightmare of being shrunk to the size of a crumb, the huge massive horses which had already made you uneasy now terrified you to the core. Because of your inability to act, your fate is sealed. The horses' hoof comes down hard and crushes you. Killing you instantly. You have become nothing more than a bonemeal pancake along with the other compacted mud and dirt that caked the insides of the horses' shoe. You disappear without a trace with no one knowing. Zimmerman had no idea where you went and had to phone for another investigator. The criminals succeeded in their crime. What it was? No one knew, because you failed to find out. But what I can tell you, it's too late, for you it's....
1113122.title: No, you are reduced to bonemeal paste!

11132.content: You realize you are sitting on a massive cylinder, a little shorter than you are and almost 300 feet long. There are hundreds of other such structures strewn across the floor near you. Quickly realizing it's straw, you realize that you've shrunk to the absolutely minuscule size of 1/8 of an inch! You start to wonder how this day could get any better, when you remember you're not alone in this stall. That white and brown horse is standing in the corner, a looking just under a mile tall. Before you can make your next move, the massive mountain begins moving towards you. The real question now is whether this pile of straw is...
11132.title: 1/8 inch tall

111321.content:
The horse seems to have no interest in eating any of the straw around you, meaning it's probably its bedding. You breathe a hesitant sigh of relief. Being eaten might be out of the picture, but that horse tromping around in here is still a very likely way to go.

Sure enough, the horse starts to move right toward you! You balance along the stalk of straw as fast as you can, to the side of the stall and away from the house sized hooves rapidly approaching. You hop from one stalk to the other, and easily make it before the horse stops, stomping down where you were a few seconds before. You pause to catch your breath, and watch the horse drink from a blue metal bucket hanging next to the stall door. A little water spills over the side. Seeing the bulges travel down this massive creature's throat sends shivers down your spine.

After a solid minute of drinking, the horse lifts its head back up and turns around. Instead of walking anywhere, the horse promptly lays down, sending a powerful tremor through the ground. All you can see of it now is its gigantic rear end and white tail.

Actually, this presents an interesting idea: with the horse laying down like it is, climbing up it for safety would be really easy, in a manner of speaking. All you'd have to do is climb the side of a hoof and walk along its leg, or climb a hair of its tail like a rope. Both are pretty risky, given how easily anything can hurt or kill you, but that horses back is probably one of the safer places to be.

You head out, making your way toward...
111321.title: Its bed?

choices: The ground shudders: the horse is standing!
1113211.content:
It may be more difficult, but at least the hoof won't flick at a bug and slingshot you off. You start toward the hoof, already planning your climb from what little detail you can make out.

As you near it, you begin to doubt your plan. You were never fond of heights, and the hoof rises above you to uncomfortable levels the closer you get. By the time youre standing next to it, it's a good nine or ten stories tall. Small bits of dirt, dried grass, and other trampled ground litter- including clumps of something that smells awful- are stuck to the bottom of the hoof, which will make your climb substantially easier.

Thankfully, a stalk of straw leads right up over the bottom of the horses metal shoe, which would have been the hardest to climb. You walk along the stalk and start climbing. Grains of sand and hardened dirt as large as your hand make things so simple.

When you're almost at the top, you start heading to the right, to get around the horseshoe at the top. It takes only a couple minutes, but you finally reach the horses bridge sized ankle. From here, the entire rest of the city sized horse is laid out before you. It's flank and ribs are rolling hills, and it's individual hairs tower over your puny frame like a forest. Without anything else to do, you resume your hike up to its back.

Eventually, you reach its knee, when suddenly...
1113211.title: Its hoof

choices: Your prayers are in vain. He's taking the horse out to graze!
1113212.content:
You decide that its tail would probably be less dangerous. You make your way, stalk by stalk, toward the white cables strewn across the floor. The horses rear end becomes more and more mountainous as you get closer. By the time you come to the closest tail hair, you have to crane your neck upward to see the highest visible point, which is just half of its top cheek.

"Now or never..." You mumble to yourself. You follow the trail of the hair until it becomes vertical and start to climb it. It's far more difficult than you thought it would be. For one, it's way higher up than you had imagined, and you do not get very far before you have to stop and take a breath. When you look down, you are only about two inches off the ground. You look upward and see you're not even a third of the way to the top. "This is hopeless" you think to yourself. You'll be out of energy and stuck half way to the top as a best case scenario. With your hopes dashed, you begin to slide back down.

Suddenly, you feel a vibration from the horse. You freeze in place. Did it feel you? No, it couldn't; not at this size.

"MORNIN' BOY!" A man's voice booms behind you. You look back and up to see Zimmerman smiling down at the horse from the hallway!

Then you're rising, high into the air so fast that you're already strained grip can barely fight. Wind screams past you as the horse stands and spins around to face the giant. you slide just a little further down on the hair, your grip tightening with the adrenaline coursing through you. Falling would be fatal from up here, now hundreds of feet to you. From your vantage point, You are able to see Zimmerman's body between the horse's gigantic legs, and you pray that he's not here to take the horse out.
1113212.title: It's white tail

111322.content:
A single earthquake shakes the floor and you watch a little dust rise from around the horses hoof. It's... Mesmerizing really. You gaze up at the animal, unable to tear your eyes away. It's looking down, right at you but, more past you. It's head begins to descend toward you, and your eyes go wide as you realize exactly what its looking at.

You get up and run, balancing along one of the pieces of straw, as fast as your shrunken little legs will take you. You make it to the end and leap onto another just as he horse buries its enormous muzzle into the straw. The entire tiny pile shakes and tilts back toward it. The piece of straw you are on lifts up further than you can stay on. You slide and roll backward. Only briefly catching your feet before stumbling back. You hit a wall, a leathery wall that is radiating a fair amount of heat. You push off of it , but never have the chance to right yourself before it begins to lift upward. You're pushed back and watch in awe as the horses muzzle lifts high into the air, long bits of straw dangling from its mouth. You turn and scramble up and away from the beast, but something big slams into your back. It isn't hard enough to break bones, but it is still painful and successfully pins you down. You manage to look back up and see...
111322.title: breakfast time

choices: A truck-sized fly landing near you
1113221.content:
You watch in terrorized anticipation as the horse slowly finishes chewing, swallows and... Phew!... Looks away. Earthquakes shake loose the stalk pinning you down as the horse turns around to look outside its window. Then, all is still again. It's tail moves around above you, casting a cool breeze on your form. You instantly jump up and sprint to the side of the stall as fast as your little legs can carry you, stalk-hopping all the way. After only about a solid minute or two of running, you hit dirt, then the red painted wood of the wall you sink down and catch a much needed breather. You still keep an eye on the horse nearby even though it's a "safe" distance away.

Only a short time later, you feel as much as hear a buzzing. It is...
1113221.title: the horse is done eating

choices: He takes you to his home
11132212.content:
Bzzzzzzz... Bzzzzzzz... Bzzzzz. You frantically reach into your pocket and take out your phone, almost dropping it in the process.
"Where are you man? You're never late to-"

"Danny? Oh my god where are you? No, wait; doesn't matter. You need to go to Zimmerman's farm right now! And bring an empty pill bottle!"

"Okay, but-"

"Just do it! Ill explain everything when you get here." You hang up and pray he listens. Your phone is at 25% battery life, so you turn it off to stretch that out. The horse shifts a few steps, making you jump a bit.

The sound of a car parking and shutting off alerts you and you run to the end of the stall and look out. Danny, your coworker and good friend is stepping out of his sedan and looking around. You quickly turn your phone on and wait for his call. Zimmerman meets him and they shake hands. Words are shared and Zimmerman leaves a moment later. Bzzzzzz... You answer after only one ring.

"Okay, I'm here, what now?" He asks.

"Go into the stable." You reply. You watch as he approaches, growing more intimidating with each step. "Stop! He halts directly beside you. "Now turn...and stop!" He's facing you now, much to the curiosity of the paint horse. "Take out the pill bottle and open it. Put it on the ground." Under your eye, or, over it, he pops open the bottle and sets it down. You sprint over to it and climb inside. Just in time, too. The horse sniffing at the bottle blows you all the way to the bottom. You regain yourself and brace for what's next. "Now pick it up gently and look inside." The bottle is lifted away from the horse's hairy nose and you come face to face with the building sized face of your friend. He squints at you and his eyes go wide a moment later.

"What... happened to you? Wha..." He is lost for words. You two just stare at each other.

"I need you to take me to your house." You say calmly.
11132212.title: Who you gonna call?

choices: The horse is still curious about the bottle!
111322121.content:
you could tell by the look in Danny's eyes that things were about to get rough. unfortunately, two things occurred: you belatedly realized you had no handholds in this spacious pill bottle, and you were right about it getting rough. your giant friend begins to sway a bit, then collapses, landing partially in the horses stall.

now, that last bit seems hilarious from the perspective of a normally sized person, but for you, it is anything but. Danny manages to keep hold of the bottle as he falls, during which time you are screaming like a child, and the speed of the fall presses you against the side of the bottle. when he hits the ground, it rolls away into the hay of the stall. by some miracle, the motion of the bottle keeps you from hitting the opposite side on impact, which surely would have been fatal, but you are spun around the walls like a wheel.

when the bottle finally stops moving, you feel dizzier than you have ever felt, and your pounding heart is not helping matters. you slowly stand and stumble around until you manage to get yourself oriented again. then you look around at the now orange tinted landscape. there is no possible way you get out of the bottle without outside help, but that may be the least of your problems...
111322121.title: Timber!

choices: no one comes to help you...
1113221212.content:
a tremor shakes the bottle, and something large moving to your left catches your eye. the color of the bottle makes things hard to see, but when you look up, you know what it was without a doubt. two great chasms hover above you, sending hot fog over the top of the bottle. a leathery gap between them sprouts hairs longer than you.

the horse has found you.

sadly for you, Danny had somewhat sweaty palms before he let you go, and the bottle rolled around in the hay before stopping. as far as the horse was concerned, the bottle was just a big treat, and it intended to do what he did to all treats he was given.

you scream again, helpless, as the horses great lips part, revealing orange teeth. then those open, revealing an orange, slimy maw that descends toward you. the lips close around the bottle, gripping it, and the horse lifts its head. it tosses the while bottle into its mouth and bites at it experimentally, scraping against the walls. terrible cracking and screeching sounds erupt as the horse tries to chew the bottle. you are thrown around inside as the horse maneuvers the bottle around in its mouth, coating the outside in hot saliva. then, because your day could not get any worse, the tongue tilts back, angling the bottle to easily fit down the horses throat. you are tosses to the back of it, watching in horror as the last bit of light leaves the maw and horses lips shut. then, the bottle is pulled down the long fleshy tube of the shire horses throat. you don't scream. you don't panic, immediately. you just freeze in terrified awe. a horse just ate you!
1113221212.title: The horse is still curious about the bottle!

choices: Zimmerman doesnt believe him, and danny is forced to leave
11132212121.content:
danny woke up just after the horse found the bottle, but remained too groggy to process his best friend being eaten beside him. by the time he stood up, you were already making your way down its esophagus, presumably to your doom. danny stood up and shook his head, slowly remembering what happened and still not quite believing it. either way, he looked around for the bottle he had dropped, and when he couldn't find it he became a little worried. he ducked under the stable barricade, a simple piece of wood on a hinge, and looked around about where it would have been. he freezes when he hears a loud rumble from the horses stomach, right behind him. he turns around and his eyes widen as he realizes what happened. he bolts out of the stable and sprints toward Zimmerman's home.

inside the literal belly of the beast, you finally drop into the pitch dark chamber of the horses stomach, and it growls loudly, welcoming you. given that it is relatively early in the day, the stomach is not really full of anything. now you start to panic, but you have enough rationality left to know that screaming and running around will only waste the limited amount of oxygen you have in this bottle.

the horse, having eaten its treat, feels the effects of eating something small: he wants more, confirmed by his stomach making noises. given that the strange treat was somewhat hard to swallow, his throat hurt a bit. taking a few steps to the outer window of his stall, he drinks deeply from his bucket hanging just off to the side of the window. he downs it in a matter of seconds, then begins to eat from a large bag hanging by the bucket.

you are already feeling the temperature start to rise from the horses natural body heat around you. if the lack of air doesn't kill you, the heat just might. suddenly, though, you feel small earthquakes. "the horse is walking," you say aloud. then, just as suddenly, the horse stops, and you are swept up in a torrent of water swirling around inside the stomach. you circle the stomach numerous times before settling down. now, you are almost cold.
11132212121.title: Danny wakes up in time

111322121211.content: Danny pleads his case to Zimmerman fro his doorstep, omitting the part about his shrunken friend inside the bottle. naturally, this is very concerning to Zimmerman, who jogs back to the stable with Danny and immediately retrieves a bottle of liquid laxative from a shelf at the opposite end of the stable. measuring the proper dose, he makes his way around the stable to the now empty bucket and dumps it in, then partially fills the bucket again. the horse, of course, takes to the bucket, downing all its contents and nickering happily at Zimmerman. the man walks back to danny, who is ringing his hands in worry. "there is nothing more that I can do. I will tell you when it passes."
111322121211.title: 'lax bro

1113221212111.content:
You slump to the plastic ground, leaning up against the bottles cap as it floats at the top of the horses stomach. The temperature is still rising and You have begin to sweat a bit, despite the water filling the cavernous chamber.

A near deafening roar forces you to cover your ears. It is so loud it shakes the bottle, sending tremors all around you. Then, abruptly, you feel motion. Something has created a current in the water, and you know it can only be one thing, which means you don't need to confirm it and waste precious battery life by using the flashlight on your phone. Sure enough, you feel a slight dropping motion as the stomach's contents are drained into a long set of fleshy tunnels. It is far from a gentle ride: more of a brief flume that tosses you around like a rag doll. Thankfully, the water is absorbed enough by the intestines to let you settle on the ground, where only muscle contractions push and pull you along. However, you seem to be moving rather quickly, or perhaps that's just your imagination.
1113221212111.title: Inside the equine colossus...

choices: You and the napkin are blown onto the floor
111322122.content:
"Uh... Yeah... Alright." Danny mumbles. It's clear he's in a bit of shock right now. Thankfully, he's functional enough to put the lid on the bottle and tuck it into his shirt pocket. You bounce up and down as he walks, but not enough to be painful or too uncomfortable. You feel him climb into the car, it starts, and you're moving.
-----
Danny sits at the bar inside his house, staring down at you with bulging eyes. He put you on a small napkin on the counter and there you two have been for nearly twenty minutes. You take out your phone and call him. You feel the vibrations from here. Danny snaps to attention and answers the phone.

"This silence is making things worse." You say flatly.

"Sorry. It's just..." He trails off, not taking his eyes off you.

"Just strange. Trust me, I know. I didn't expect to almost be eaten whole by a horse today, but it happened." Danny seems to be coming to terms with your new situation.

"What are we going to do about this then?" He asks. You can only shrug.

"I don't know if I scared off the guys that did this, and I don't want you going back there to find out." Danny goes back to staring at you.

"This is the weirdest day of my life." He mumbles.

"Your life? Look at me!" At that very moment, the front door bursts open, allowing the entrance of a woman little girl, and the only other creature you had hoped not so see: a dog, and a big one at that. "Hi honey!" The woman trills. Instantly, you hang up the phone and stash it in your pocket. It's your only lifeline now. Danny stands up quickly, knocking over his chair in fright. You-
111322122.title: well... This is awkward.

1113221221.content: The motion of Danny standing caused a small gush of air to blow the napkin you are standing on off the counter. Luckily you were able to hold onto the napkin, but unfortunately the napkin was heading for the floor. You and the napkin land safely on the floor, but there was a new problem though. You were now right in the path of Danny's wife and daughter who are now barefoot after leaving their shoes at the door. The ground beneath you shakes as the two continue to walk towards you. You try to run but your foot was stuck in a small tare in the napkin. As you try to get your foot unstuck the bare feet of the unaware giantesses were almost upon you. After a few more seconds you got your foot free but it was too late. A shadow formed around you and you look up to see the massive bare foot of....
1113221221.title: You and the napkin are blown onto the floor

choices: You notice a strand of long horse hair in the mouth, maybe you could grab hold?
1113222.content:
You painfully twist your head around to see what had happened to you... A piece of hay seemed to have fallen out of the horses chewing maw and crashed directly onto your back, pinning you to the ground. You attempted to pry off the heavy column before your attention was drawn back to the horse who, judging from his open mouth, was still hungry and coming in for another bite of hay!

You desperately struggle to get the hay off but the combination of how small you were plus the quickness of the horse's mouth made it an impossible feat. You could only watch as its open mouth descended towards you, gradually widening which allowed you a full view of the inner workings of it's maw. Dull white teeth jutted out of the side like gigantic bricks, giving off the impression they could crush your bones in a heartbeat without the horse feeling a thing. The second most glaring feature was it's long, wet tongue, bits and pieces of hay still strung onto it as saliva dripped down. Regardless that was enough sight seeing and the time of eating was here.

The horse's mouth crashed down around you, casting you in darkness as it's teeth slid along the hay underneath you. Your ears popped as you felt yourself and the hay rising up off the ground as the horse began to tear away the chunk of food from the rest of the pile. The experience would've been traumatic enough, but then the horse began chewing. You watched in horror as it's looming teeth rose and fell onto the hay, the first bite knocking the hay off you thankfully, but giving you a sense of vertigo as you flew around the soggy mouth, crashing into the roof before falling back dazed onto the mush of hay.

Good news, you weren't pinned down anymore
Bad news, you were about 5 seconds from being a horse's breakfast
What happens next?
1113222.title: He's coming for another bite!

11132221.content:
Before you could come up with some sort of plan to get out of here, you felt a tugging from behind you and in the blink of an eye, you and the ocean of chewed up hay around you were washed downwards in the long, dark, wet abyss of the horse's throat. From every side you were squeezed by what used to be the hay pinning you down, but what was now just nutrients for this farm animal. Vision was impossible as the last source of light was flushed away when the horse had the reflex to swallow, and all you could feel was the horrible pit in your stomach that came along whenever you fell a great height, like you were on a rollarcoaster...albeit a fleshy, wet, dark and smelly rollarcoaster.

Finally after what seemed like an eternity of free falling through the horse's esophagus a hole opened up below you and, after pausing for a second for the food to squeeze through, you feel head first into a pool of liquid, likely the horse's stomach acids.
"No no no! This can't be happening!" You gasped as you began treading water in the acidic pond. "God dammit this can't be how it ends!" Your eyes felt like someone had splashed lemons in them and your nose was ripe with the smell of horse bile. Everywhere you looked was darkness and your entire body stung like hell, the acids already working their way into your flesh.

You wouldn't survive much longer in here, a few curses later you passed out from a lack of oxygen. The horse went about its day like nothing strange had ever happened, nothing but a few bones left over in the horse's waste to indicate anybody had ever been there at all.
11132221.title: The horse swallows

choices: Climb up obviously, you'll think of a way down later.
Keep clinging on, maybe the horse will go somewhere you can jump off.
11132222.content:
"Yes! Yes! A piece of hair!" You think to yourself as you notice the slimy hair protruding between the horse's teeth. You reach an arm out and, at the very last second, manage to grab on. You pull with all your might and cling desperately on as the horse swallows, the sea of chewed up hay washing down just below you, every strand threatening to knock your legs off of your precarious spot on the horse hair. The swallow does end eventually, and at the end of the ordeal you were left with an empty mouth, save for a shrunken person clinging on for dear life on a strand of hair. The smell of hay washes over you as the horse releases some gas, unknowingly also knocking the piece of hair loose from the mouth with you still hanging onto it for your life.

You looked around and no way looked very promising. Below you, well you were dangling several thousand feet in the air at this point, any drop at this height could and would kill you on impact. In front of you was the horse's mouth, closed now, looking not very appealing for someone who was seconds away from becoming his breakfast. Finally above you the hair extended up onto the horse's mane.

Where do you decide to go?
11132222.title: You notice a strand of long horse hair in the m...

11133.content:
As your senses finally come back around, you look around and see a blurry mess. The only object that you can clearly see is a massive, beige cylinder that seems to rise 40 feet in the air, and seems to be half a mile long. You move back, and slowly realize what it is: a piece of straw! If that's how big a single piece of straw is, you can't possibly be larger than 1/64 of an inch. At that size, a horse would be nearly 5 miles tall!

...speaking of the horse, you feel and hear a massive rumbling behind you. You turn around to see a...
11133.title: Microscopic

111331.content: You turn around just in time to watch a hoof larger than any skyscraper touch down with an earth-shattering boom. You realize that the blurry wall behind you is the stable door, which the horse has stepped towards to take a look outside. Now that you look closer at the stable door, there's a whole 400 feet (1 inch) of clearance under the door. However, walking around on the floor might be a bad idea, as even ants could kill you without noticing. Maybe you should consider climbing the horse for protection?
111331.title: A 1500 foot tall hoof

choices: You've still got your luck, for now.
1113311.content:
You should go ahead and get off the floor as fast as possible, so you begin jogging towards the monolithic hoof. You pass by more gigantic pieces of straw, as well as the smashed remains of a few building-sized insects. Even smashed to a pancake of chitin, they are many times larger than you. It's a good thing this horse hasn't moved an inch, otherwise you'd have to keep chasing down a hoof while it lumbers overhead. After a few minutes, you reach the base of the hoof. There are pits, scratches, and other imperfections across the hoof, perfect for climbing. Even if those weren't helpful enough, the hoof, at this size, is basically a set of really, really steep stairs due to the way it grows.

After...well, you don't really know how long it's been since you've started climbing, but you're still on the hoof. You can see a massive forest of hairs, each almost as wide as you are tall, a few hundred feet up. Of course, now is the perfect time for something to go wrong, right?
1113311.title: Climb the horse's hoof

11133111.content:
As your arm reaches for the first hair above the hoof, you feel a shudder as the hoof sharply rises in the air. You lose your grip on the tough wall, but are sucked along with the surrounding air. The hoof continues to lift up to about a mile in height, before just as quickly dropping to the floor. As you free fall alongside the mountain of hoof, you watch your life flash before your eyes. With a "THOOM", the hoof slams into the dirt, and a blast of air sends you flying. To you, the whole world has been shattered. To the horse, he just took a step.

As your body sails upward, you are sent right past the muzzle of the enormous horse. He huffs, and a hurricane sends you careening even further up. Miles in the air now, you are sent flying towards...
11133111.title: Something does go wrong

111331111.content: Somewhere on the horse, or perhaps in his food/water?
111331111.title: Somewhere inside this stall

1113311111.content:
As you descend, it's like you're looking out an airplane window. Everything has such detail, despite being miles away from you. It makes the size of the horse compared to you all the more horrifying when you are looking at it from above.
While it feels as if you are falling, you notice it's more accurately "settling," like a sheet of paper in the wind. On the plus side, death from a fall is probably out of the question. You'd prefer not to test it, but that's not really a choice you have.
The horses back is dotted with white spots that get more and more detailed as you drop closer. Before you even reach its head level, every hair is clear, and as thick as tree trunks. You brace for landing and crash amongst one, bouncing off to hit another, all the way down to the horses pinkish. You stand and brush yourself off. The beasts skin is a bit flaky but nothing you can't manage. The real trick will be knowing which way you're going. You got a bit turned around during your fall.
You look upward. The hairs are easily ten times your height, but look tough enough to climb with only minimal trouble. The rafters of the ceiling are a bit clearer than when you were on the ground, but still a little blurred.
After a few minutes of climbing, and slipping once, you make it over the tops of the hairs and observe your surroundings. You Landed squarely at the middle of its hindquarters, only a mile or two from what looks to be its tail. A mountain of thick white cables attach to the horses body and descend over the edge, out of sight. In the opposite direction, the animals entire back is laid out before you. It's white and brown hairs are an endless forested plateau, just waiting for you to get lost in. At the end, it's white mane and the back of its head rise higher into the sky, it's brown ears becoming two peaks.

On one hand, given how thick these hairs are, you could just climb down one of its back legs and pray it doesn't shake you off or start walking, or start making your way towards its head, aiming to stay up here for a while where it's safe. There's no telling where you'll end up if you are blown off from this high up.
1113311111.title: On the horse

choices: An elephantine fly. Ugh, you’ve barely grown!
11133111113.content:
The ground beneath you rumbles as the world moves. You grab onto the nearest hair as the ground rocks back and forth. The blurry shapes of massive objects pass by, each just a bit too big for you to identify them. Suddenly, a shadow appears overhead as one of the massive objects comes closer.

Looking up you see a blurry figure that sort of resembles a man's face and body followed by a second figure that resembles the same thing. But due to being so tiny it's hard to tell. All you can do is stare up at this humongous figure above you. And hope that you don't end up dead by something deciding to take a seat on this enormous beast of a horse.

The two figures above you were none the less then the guys who shrunk you. They had returned to perform more testing on their device and had no idea that you were right there with them. They walked up to the horse and one of the guys fires his shrink ray, minimizing the horse down to the size of an action figure. This in return had made you nanoscopic, but since you didn't realize any changes you had no idea of this, and just held on for dear life to the hair of the horse.

The two guys were amazed since unlike last time where they did this, and they had no way of controlling what size the creature can shrink to. This time it was almost exactly the size of what they were looking for. Picking up the horse the two guys brought it (and you). Out behind the barn. They now wanted to see if they could control how big they could make the horse. And so, they picked a random size and fired the laser from the shrink ray. Unknowingly to them and lucky for you it was aimed right at you. You sprint toward the fly's nearest leg and get a running leap onto it. Hairs thinner than even you provide excellent handholds. the fly doesn't even notice its new passenger and continues to slurp up whatever is spat onto the horse's skin.

Suddenly, you see the world get just a little darker. you look past the fly and see a great collection of thick hairs flying toward you! this is it. you're going to die, hugging a fly's leg on the back of a horse. you close your eyes and brace for impact. the fly takes off at the last possible second, almost losing you. you open your eyes and panic: the tail surrounds you like the tube of an ocean wave, or, in this case, a tsunami of epic proportions. It rushes toward you, trapping you between it and the horses flank. a quickly closing gap is ahead, and they fly is headed right for it. you cringe as the tail comes near.

The fly makes it out just as the tail collides with a loud and dull Thwack and lifts away from the horse entirely. you hug the leg just a little tighter as the insect's flight pattern becomes erratic, but watch where you are heading. the fly is making its way...
111331111132.title: An elephantine fly

1113311111323.content:
Higher and higher the fly... Flies, taking you well out of range of any horse related danger. The rafters are hot and dark, and the fly lands heavily on one with enough force to knock you off. You land hard on your butt and stand just in time to be blown back down when the fly lifts off and departs for another go at a horse.

Well, now you're up here. Hairs as high to you as picket fences and dust fibers the width of your finger cover the ground, and the grain of the wood creates high rolling hills for you to traverse. Looking around, you're rather horrified to see a few spiderwebs in the distance. At your size, it's safe to say they wouldn't come after you, but think of how they'd look.

You walk for a minute or two, climbing over a few stray hairs, to the edge of the beam and look down. You are at the opposite end of the stable now, between two now empty stalls. The paint horse is a distant blur, while still mind blowingly large.

You hear a skittering noise to your right. You feel a rumbling on the wooden surface. You swivel to face the new danger and freeze at the sight: a roach, the size of an aircraft carrier, is speeding toward you. You can't help his gag at how grotesque it is in this much detail. It's mandibles are hairy and constantly move around in front of its mouth, which is just a little black hole.

It doesn't notice you and walks by, but The air displaced as it moves is enough to send you over the edge and into the open abyss. Screaming for help is pointless, so you pray instead. You pray that you'll at least survive the fall.

Wait a sec... Do you hear whistling? You pause in your prayers and look through the open stable does below you. Zimmerman is just outside and heading toward your flight path! He's he's pushing what looks like a wheelbarrow, but you can't make out its contents, if any.
1113311111323.title: up into the rafters

choices: Hard metal. The wheelbarrow is empty
An expanse  of fresh hay and wood shavings
11133111113231.content: The spinning and twisting doesn't help your vertigo, or your attempts to see exactly what you are going to land on, but it's pretty obvious that you'll be landing inside the wheelbarrow. The metal walls rise on all sides and confirm your guess. Sure enough, you finally crash into...
11133111113231.title: You land in the wheelbarrow

1113311112.content: Do you fall into his feeding bag or water trough?
1113311112.title: His food/water

choices: No chance, it's feeding time already!
11133111121.content:
The air currents send you tumbling all over the stall. A few flies also in the air lazily buzz past, circling the horse's rear. As you get closer, the horse's tail flicks up, smashing a couple flies and creating yet another blast of wind. This time, you slam into a thick cloth wall, which causes you to pass out

You wake up, and take a look around. You are deep in a pile of green grass, grass essentially being a pile of bridges all around you, inside some massive black bag. You also notice the distinct smell of alfalfa, which is odd, because you don't notice any nearby-

Wait..

You are in a bag of alfalfa. Since the bag's opening is about half a mile wide, the same size as the horses muzzle, this is probably the horse's feeding bag. Hopefully the horse isn't hungry right now, but even if he's not how are you going to get out?
11133111121.title: Feeding bag

choices: Down to the ground, amidst equine colossi and green skyscrapers
Blown Into the fabric of Zimmerman's shirt.
Back into the feed bag as it is righted
111331111211.content:
Without delay, you get up and jog along an alfalfa stalk the size of an four lane bridge toward the black wall of the feeding bag. After a minute or two of running, you reach it, and see that you won't be able to just crawl through the holes between fibers, despite your size; You'll have to climb it. Thankfully, the fibers are small and tight enough that you have very little trouble using them like a ladder.

After what seems like an hour (really only a few minutes,) you come upon a hole in the fabric mesh. A regular person would not easily notice it, but to you it's like a cathedral door. You adjust direction to reach it and climb through a moment later.

Suddenly, when you are halfway through the hole, gravity multiplies and pins you down to fibers half as wide as you. You watch the outside world descend below you at a terrifying speed. It stops so abruptly that you are thrown against the top of the hole and nearly tumble out of it entirely! Your grip holds, however, and you scramble to the outside of the bag and keep your grip for dear life.

Something big and brown moves inside the bag. You peer through the hole and see brown hair, great leathery lips, and yellowed teeth the size of houses. They all work together to take huge chunks out of the pile of alfalfa inside and pull it into the horses titanic mouth. You breath a sigh of relief. You have no idea how you would possibly have escaped that.

The world starts moving. All around you the stable is moving away and you see that you are headed toward the entrance. You wrap your arms around a fiber and hang on for the ride. The horses slow, lumbering steps take a few seconds each to occur, but each one takes you miles at a time.

The horse is led out of the stable and toward the pasture to graze with the other horses, about twenty from what you can make out. The fence and gate are still pretty far away, but many of the horses are sticking around the edge near a metal water trough. Your heart begins racing at the thought of having to avoid all of those behemoths.

Zimmerman opens the wooden gate and leads you both into the field. By now, the horse is licking up the last stray pieces of alfalfa inside the bag. A massive hand rises above you and removes the strap from the horse's head. The horse, from what you can see, barely moves before lowering its head to graze, leaving you to the mercy of an unaware Zimmerman. A few of them approach you, stopping around you all and see if Zimmerman brought them any treats. He hadn't, so they go back to grazing where they stood.

Suddenly, you, the bag, and everything you can see are quickly flipped upside down. As if that wasn't bad enough, and you weren't close to falling, the giant farmer begins shaking out the bag! Gravity fluctuates for you, and you are positive your going to lose your grip.

And... There it goes. You plummet off the bag and into the open air, where you land...
111331111211.title: start climbing

choices: You see an enormous Bull coming towards the salt lick!
a titanic brown Clydesdale is headed your way!
1113311112111.content:
You hit a blade of grass and slide down it to the ground. You are terrified as you hear an ear splitting neigh from a horse. With you being so small the sound is deeper and slower, making it sound more like a war horn. This terrifies you and you run off through the green jungle of grass. You continue running until you run into a huge white wall. You realize that it must be a salt lick and decide that you should climb it so you have a better chance of getting on to an animal when Zimmerman comes back to take them in from grazing.

You are small enough that each grain of sand is closer to the size of you, but with the way they are stuck together, the cracks and edges make claiming really easy. Even so, It takes about a half hour to get to the top. When you get there you are greeted with an unending white plain and small lakes of sticky saliva. You flop onto your back to rest and
1113311112111.title: The salt lick

choices: The Bulls head is coming toward you!
11133111121111.content:
Thoom... Thoom... Thoom... Thoom... Your eyes snap open at both the sound and the vibrations growing closer and stronger. Those same vibrations helped you drift off to sleep... However long ago, but they were nowhere near as strong, or getting stronger. You hastily stand up and look for its source. Nothing to your left, only a few horses barely discernible in the distance. The fence stretches up and out to your right. Grass rises in front of you, to high to make out anything beyond. You wouldn't know what's over there until it was right on top of you. So that only leaves...

A shadow passes over you. Earthquakes that seconds ago were shaking you off the ground a little have stopped completely. You spin around and are met by a titanic, brown, hairy pillar. You follow it up and up and up until you see the horned head of a bull directly above you. bits of grass and spit cling to its chin. That massive spire was just one of its legs. Every hair on it is in perfect detail to you. Any closer and it would have kicked the salt lick, sending you flying.

Everything is dead still. The bull is just standing there, not doing anything, which is all the scarier to you because it could act at any moment. You quickly start to plan your next move when suddenly.
11133111121111.title: You see an enormous Bull coming towards the sal...

choices: You get caught on the upper lip
You get pulled in to the giant mouth
111331111211111.content:
You look up as the beasts head starts to move down towards you. Your plan isn't fully formulated yet but you don't have time to think. The head is descending like an asteroid. You start to run in the direction of the fence and hear a wet squelch as the tounge hits the salt lick. You don't look back for fear of tripping but you can see the shadow of its head falling over you. You feel the breath as it exhales. You can't run any faster and the massive wall of pink hits you.

You scream in terror and turn your head to see that your about the size of a taste bud. Suddenly the tongue lifts and the head moves away from the white valley that is the salt lick. The bull starts to bring its tongue into its mouth and...
111331111211111.title: A daring escape

1113311112111112.content: There's nothing you can do as the bull's tongue pulls you into his mouth. Hurricane force winds blow all around you with every breath the massive beast takes, each one ripe with a disgusting scent of a being that's never once brushed its teeth. However, you cannot escape as the bull's stickly saliva has you trapped to its tongue, leaving you at the mercy of its whims. You stare up at the roof of its mouth A hundred feet Above you, almost seeming like the roof of a cathedral overhead. Just one made of ridged flesh. You wait in terror as the bull walks on, having gotten a good taste of salt on its taste buds. Its booming steps echo around you.
1113311112111112.title: Enter the Bull

choices: You slide down the pulsating esophagus and plop down into the stomach.
You manage to cling to the walls of the esophagus, making the bull gag!
11133111121111121.content:
As the gigantic beast walks along, you find yourself almost paralysed with fear as you were laying on his big, meaty tongue. Not that you would be able to move with all that sticky saliva coating your miniscule body, of course, but still, the possibility of stimulating the bulls tastebuds was way too terrifying. Also, it was impossible to maneuver inside the maw anyway since there was no light source present and the only thing you were able to witness were the booming steps and the various sounds of the animal in whose insides you found yourself trapped in. No choice but to wait and hope for the best; Though the whole situation didn't exactly make you feel optimistic.

Suddenly, a monstrous grumble emerged from what you presumed to be the throat of the massive bovine. Before you could even make anything out of it, the tongue beneath you began to quiver and wiggle, causing you to roughly tumble around in the moist maw until you ended up further towards the centre of the pink muscle. You quickly noticed that the bull was producing more and more spit as it accumulated around you at a incredibly fast pace, urging you to swim in the thick fluid which reeked of rotten grass and other smells you weren't able to identify. Point is, it smelled like hell, but it didn't even came close to the shock that struck through your body as you felt yourself and the spit slide down the tastebuds of the beast. "NO, DON'T!" you screamed in absolute terror as the bull prepared to swallow you along with the spit in his maw as he was tired of the salty taste. You would just end up in the belly of a farm animal who didn't even know that it was ending someones life, insignificant as you were indeed. Your fate was being devided by a simple mating bull -How humiliating and terrifying at the same time.

As you slide down towards your doom, you try to cling to the slippery tastebuds - without any success. Screaming, you fell down a seemingly endless abyss, just before hearing a bone chilling churning along with a big gulp. The bull swallowed. You were done for.
11133111121111121.title: Down into the behemoth.

choices: Yes, and you tried figure out why to get out!
No, You got digested with bull foods
111331111211111211.content:
You scream while slide down bull Esophagus! But after few mins you push out of Esophagus and immediately plop down into bull stomach which have half eat grass and half eat hays! And you immediately pound on fresh wall of stomach! “SOMEONE HELP ME, I BEEN ATE BY BULL!” You scream!

(Did you survived inside bull stomach?)
111331111211111211.title: You slide down the pulsating esophagus and plop...

choices: The horse stands over the salt lick!
The horse steps over the salt lick!
11133111121112.content: An equine head rises over the grass as it lumbers toward you, shaking the earth with each powerful step. At its speed, there is no way you would be able to escape, so you seek shelter. There is a small crack in the salt lick. Well, small to anything normally sized. It can easily fit you. You sprint toward it and slide the last little bit to squeeze inside. Already, the Clydesdale towers over you, and it still a good ten feet away!
11133111121112.title: a titanic brown Clydesdale is headed your way!

choices: you make it into the stable
11133111121113.content:
you wake up some time later, which is strange doing on your own. Given the situation, you had not expected to get any sort of break, much less a nap. aren't salt licks supposed to be popular among animals? whatever; don't kiss a gift horse in the mouth, or go anywhere near its mouth at your size for that matter. you stand up and stretch, wiping a few stray bits of salt dust off your shirt, which has fared quite well so far. Now, lets see:
